snippet: LARSON--Rev. Dr. Lawrence A.A.,died on January 16, 2016 at the age of 81. Born on December 27, 1934 to Julia and Adolph Larson in Chicago, IL. He became ordained as an Episcopal priest in 1968 and served at James Church in Great Barrington, MA, and rector of Christ Church in Ansonia, CT and St. Andrew's Church in Brewster, NY. His 50 years of ministry were marked by commitment to social justice. His first wife Dorothy predeceased him. He married Patricia Anderson in 1983. "Father" Larry is survived by his wife Pat, children Dr. Heidi Larson, L. Jeffrey Larson, Arlan Bussell, Merryl Dimaio, Lindsey Anderson, Jevan Anderson, eight grandchildren, two great-grandchildren and his sister Merryl Sanchez. Visitation will be held on January 24th from 1pm-3pm and 6pm-8pm. A service will be held at St. Andrew's Episcopal Church, Brewster, on January 25 at 11am. Services by Beecher Funeral Home, Brewster, NY. 845-279-3615. 1/3
